metadata.title: CVE-2019-12818 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 4.20.15. Thenfc_llcp_build_tlv function in net/nfc/llcp_commands.c may return NULL. Ifthe caller does not check for this, it will trigger a NULL pointerdereference. This will cause denial of service. This affectsnfc_llcp_build_gb in net/nfc/llcp_core.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
